sentences.en: He is on the margin of bare subsistence.
sentences.cn: 他正处在挨饿的边缘.

sentences.en: He won by a narrow margin .
sentences.cn: 他以微小的差额获胜。

sentences.en: I wrote annotations in the margin of the book.
sentences.cn: 我在书的边缘作注.

sentences.en: It’ll take about 30 minutes to dry but I’d allow a safety margin of, say, another 10 minutes.
sentences.cn: 要30分钟左右才能干，不过保险一点，再多10分钟吧。

sentences.en: Margins are low and many companies are struggling.
sentences.cn: 利润很少，很多公司都在苦苦挣扎。

sentences.en: She began rubbing out the pencilled marks in the margin.
sentences.cn: 她开始擦掉空白处的铅笔笔迹。

sentences.en: She won the champion by a narrow margin.
sentences.cn: 她以微弱优势赢得冠军.

sentences.en: Someone had scribbled a note in the margin .
sentences.cn: 有人在页边写了条批注。

sentences.en: The group had a net profit margin of 30% last year.
sentences.cn: 去年，这个集团的纯利润率为30%。

sentences.en: The margin in favor was 280-to-153.
sentences.cn: 赞成票以280票比153票的优势领先。

sentences.en: The margin of safety has grown thin.
sentences.cn: 安全系数已变小了.

sentences.en: The output of 13 major products has increased by a wide margin.
sentences.cn: 13项主要产品的产量都有大幅度增长.

sentences.en: The poll has a margin of error of plus or minus 5 per cent.
sentences.cn: 民意测验有上下5%的误差率。

sentences.en: The survey has a margin of error of 2.5%.
sentences.cn: 测量的误差幅度为2.5%。

sentences.en: The village is situated at the margin of a forest.
sentences.cn: 村子位于森林的边缘.

sentences.en: the western margin of southern Africa
sentences.cn: 非洲南部的西隅

sentences.en: There are notes in the margin on every page.
sentences.cn: 每页边上都有批注.

sentences.en: They could end up with a 50-point winning margin.
sentences.cn: 他们最终可能会以50分的优势获胜。

sentences.en: They pass on their cost of borrowing and add it to their profit margin.
sentences.cn: 他们将借款成本转嫁，将其算到利润率里面。

sentences.en: Use double spacing and wide margins to leave room for comments.
sentences.cn: 采用双倍行距和宽阔的页边空白，以便留出地方写评注。

sentences.en: We allowed a margin of 20 minutes in catching the train.
sentences.cn: 我们有20分钟的余地赶火车.

sentences.en: Within 10 years they had a gross profit margin of 50%.
sentences.cn: 10年里他们的毛利率达到了50%。

words.tran_cn: 少量地；最低限度地；在栏外；在页边
排斥；忽视；使处于社会边缘；使脱离社会发展进程

[经]毛利
利差，利息差幅；利差幅度
叶缘
左空白，左端
保证金帐户；融资帐户
追加保证金；征收保证金的要求
误差容许量；误差限度
允许出错的余地；犯错误的余地
利润率
安全边际；安全系数
保证金要求；法定保证金
保证金交易（交存一定保证金不支付全部货款的交易）
薄利；没有多少余地
不活动大陆边缘，被动大陆边缘
相补角；相位容限；允许相位失真
[经]利润率
安全界限，安全裕度；安全系数
水浒；水浒传（书名，中国历史上第一部用白话文写成的章回小说）
广泛的回旋余地；广泛的利于行事的权力

trans.tran_cn: 边缘，范围，极限，利润，盈余，（版心外）的空白
trans.tran_en: the empty space at the side of a page
